alert.note: Alert for Emmet; Kossuth; Palo Alto (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 6:28PM CDT until July 10 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Emmet County in northwestern Iowa... Northern Kossuth County in north central Iowa... Northeastern Palo Alto County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Armstrong, or 13 miles east of Estherville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Iowa Lake, Okamanpedan Lake, Swan Lake, Union Slogh, Armstrong, Bancroft, Swea City, Burt, Titonka, Ringsted, Fenton, Lakota, Lone Rock, Ledyard, Dolliver and Okamanpedan State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
